changeSet.author: shiva (generated)
changeSet.createView:
select uuid() as id, u.id as user_id,u.first_name,concat(u.last_name,' ', '(OQC)') as last_name,u.login,qpm.qc_level,qpm.project_id,uom.id as user_mapping_id,qpm.status,p.customer_id,qpm.entity_id,uum.id as uum_id, uom.id as uom_id, -2 as ucm_id, -2 as uvm_id from user u, user_organisation_mapping uom, qc_project_mapping qpm,project p,uam_uom_mapping uum,user_authority_mapping uam, authority a where uom.user_id=u.id and qpm.user_mapping_id=uom.id and qpm.entity_id=1 and qpm.project_id=p.id and uum.uom_id=uom.id and uum.uam_id=uam.id and a.id=7
union
select uuid() as id, u.id as user_id,u.first_name,concat(u.last_name,' ', '(CQC)') as last_name,u.login,qpm.qc_level,qpm.project_id,ucm.id as user_mapping_id,qpm.status,p.customer_id,qpm.entity_id,uum.id as uum_id, -2 as uom_id, ucm.id as ucm_id, -2 as uvm_id from user u, user_customer_mapping ucm, qc_project_mapping qpm,project p,uam_ucm_mapping uum,user_authority_mapping uam, authority a where ucm.user_id=u.id and qpm.user_mapping_id=ucm.id and qpm.entity_id=2 and qpm.project_id=p.id and qpm.project_id=p.id and uum.ucm_id=ucm.id and uum.uam_id=uam.id and a.id=8
union
select uuid() as id, u.id as user_id,u.first_name,concat(u.last_name,' ', '(VQC)') as last_name,u.login,qpm.qc_level,qpm.project_id,uvm.id as user_mapping_id,qpm.status,p.customer_id,qpm.entity_id,uum.id as uum_id, -2 as uom_id, -2 as ucm_id, uvm.id as uvm_id from user u, user_vendor_mapping uvm, qc_project_mapping qpm,project p,uam_uvm_mapping uum,user_authority_mapping uam, authority a where uvm.user_id=u.id and qpm.user_mapping_id=uvm.id and qpm.entity_id=3 and qpm.project_id=p.id and qpm.project_id=p.id and uum.uvm_id=uvm.id and uum.uam_id=uam.id and a.id=9
union
select uuid() as id,u.id as user_id,u.first_name,concat(u.last_name,' ', '(OQC)') as last_name,u.login,pqlc.qc_level,pqlc.project_id,uum.id as user_mapping_id, 0 as status,p.customer_id as customer_id,1 as entity_id ,uum.id as uum_id,uom.id as uom_id,-2 as ucm_id,-2 as uvm_id from project p, project_qc_level_configurations pqlc,user_organisation_mapping uom,user_authority_mapping uam,user u,uam_uom_mapping uum where pqlc.project_id=p.id and uom.user_id=u.id and uam.user_id=u.id and uam.authority_id=7 and uum.uam_id=uam.id and uum.uom_id=uom.id and uum.status=1 and concat(p.id,pqlc.qc_level,uom.id,u.id) not in ( select concat(qpm.project_id,qpm.qc_level,uom.id,u.id) from user u, user_organisation_mapping uom, qc_project_mapping qpm where uom.user_id=u.id and qpm.user_mapping_id=uom.id )
union
select uuid() as id,u.id as user_id,u.first_name,concat(u.last_name,' ', '(CQC)') as last_name,u.login,pqlc.qc_level,pqlc.project_id,uum.id as user_mapping_id, 0 as status,p.customer_id as customer_id,2 as entity_id,uum.id as uum_id,-2 as uom_id,ucm.id as ucm_id,-2 as uvm_id from project p, project_qc_level_configurations pqlc,user_customer_mapping ucm,user_authority_mapping uam,user u,uam_ucm_mapping uum where pqlc.project_id=p.id and ucm.user_id=u.id and uam.user_id=u.id and uam.authority_id=8 and uum.uam_id=uam.id and uum.ucm_id=ucm.id and uum.status=1 and concat(p.id,pqlc.qc_level,ucm.id,u.id) not in ( select concat(qpm.project_id,qpm.qc_level,ucm.id,u.id) from user u, user_customer_mapping ucm, qc_project_mapping qpm where ucm.user_id=u.id and qpm.user_mapping_id=ucm.id )
union
select uuid() as id,u.id as user_id,u.first_name,concat(u.last_name,' ', '(VQC)') as last_name,u.login,pqlc.qc_level,pqlc.project_id,uvm.id as user_mapping_id, 0 as status,p.customer_id ,3 as entity_id ,uum.id as uum_id,-2 as uom_id,-2 as ucm_id,uvm.id as uvm_id from project p, project_qc_level_configurations pqlc,user_vendor_mapping uvm,user_authority_mapping uam,user u,uam_uvm_mapping uum where pqlc.project_id=p.id and uvm.user_id=u.id and uam.user_id=u.id and uam.authority_id=9 and uum.uvm_id=uvm.id and uum.status=1 and concat(p.id,pqlc.qc_level,uvm.id,u.id) not in ( select concat(qpm.project_id,qpm.qc_level,uvm.id,u.id) from user u, user_vendor_mapping uvm, qc_project_mapping qpm where uvm.user_id=u.id and qpm.user_mapping_id=uvm.id )
